1   package org.infinispan.configuration.cache;
2   
3   import static org.infinispan.configuration.cache.TakeOfflineConfiguration.AFTER_FAILURES;
4   import static org.infinispan.configuration.cache.TakeOfflineConfiguration.MIN_TIME_TO_WAIT;
5   
6   import org.infinispan.commons.configuration.Builder;
7   import org.infinispan.commons.configuration.attributes.AttributeSet;
8   import org.infinispan.configuration.global.GlobalConfiguration;
9   
10  /**
11   * @author Mircea Markus
12   * @since 5.2
13   */
14  public class TakeOfflineConfigurationBuilder extends AbstractConfigurationChildBuilder implements Builder<TakeOfflineConfiguration>{
15  
16  
17     private final AttributeSet attributes;
18     private BackupConfigurationBuilder backupConfigurationBuilder;
19  
20     public TakeOfflineConfigurationBuilder(ConfigurationBuilder builder, BackupConfigurationBuilder backupConfigurationBuilder) {
21        super(builder);
22        this.attributes = TakeOfflineConfiguration.attributeDefinitionSet();
23        this.backupConfigurationBuilder = backupConfigurationBuilder;
24     }
25  
26     /**
27      * The minimal number of millis to wait before taking this site offline, even in the case 'afterFailures' is reached.
28      * If smaller or equal to 0, then only 'afterFailures' is considered.
29      */
30     public TakeOfflineConfigurationBuilder minTimeToWait(long minTimeToWait) {
31        attributes.attribute(MIN_TIME_TO_WAIT).set(minTimeToWait);
32        return this;
33     }
34  
35     /**
36      * The number of failed request operations after which this site should be taken offline. Defaults to 0 (never). A
37      * negative value would mean that the site will be taken offline after 'minTimeToWait'.
38      */
39     public TakeOfflineConfigurationBuilder afterFailures(int afterFailures) {
40        attributes.attribute(AFTER_FAILURES).set(afterFailures);
41        return this;
42     }
43  
44     public BackupConfigurationBuilder backup() {
45        return backupConfigurationBuilder;
46     }
47  
48     @Override
49     public void validate() {
50     }
51  
52     @Override
53     public void validate(GlobalConfiguration globalConfig) {
54     }
55  
56     @Override
57     public TakeOfflineConfiguration create() {
58        return new TakeOfflineConfiguration(attributes.protect());
59     }
60  
61     @Override
62     public TakeOfflineConfigurationBuilder read(TakeOfflineConfiguration template) {
63        this.attributes.read(template.attributes());
64        return this;
65     }
66  
67     @Override
68     public String toString() {
69        return this.getClass().getSimpleName() + attributes;
70     }
71  }
